localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: One good thing is a curated repository of ideas and thoughts to keep you motivated during tough times. Feeling overwhelmed and looking for something feel-good? One good thing lets you discover an activity that can restore goodness.
nodes.title: One Good Thing - Discover a good thing you can do to brighten up your day
nodes.author: Aishwarya Ashok

nodes.excerpt: Today, weâ€™re launching our next-generation no-code platform to empower a million people to create the software they need themselves. The next version of Stacker has arrived: https://blog.stackerhq.com/announcing-the-next-version-of-stacker/
nodes.title: Stacker 2.0 - Our next-generation no-code platform is here
nodes.author: Michael Skelly

nodes.excerpt: Embed your Joonbot in seconds in your notion page. Enjoy our special PH offer: 50% off during 1 year on all plans ğŸ’¸ PHM50A for monthly plans | PHA50A for annual plans. Available until May 31.
nodes.title: Chatbot in Notion - Embed a chatbot in your Notion page
nodes.author: Tem Nugmanov

nodes.excerpt: Salesfit makes your marketing data-driven without any data science or coding skills. Just connect your data to an algorithm built for a specific use-case. Algorithms come with an example data, a step-by-step manual, and a dashboard template.
nodes.title: Salesfit 2.0 - No-code toolkit for data-driven marketing
nodes.author: Fabian Maume

nodes.excerpt: Krepling is a frictionless, centralized commerce platform that enables entrepreneurs and business owners to build, launch scale their business in a way that requires zero coding or the stitching together of desperate paid third-party systems or apps.
nodes.title: Krepling Beta - All-in-1, no-code commerce solution for SMBs & entrepreneurs
nodes.author: Liam JE Gerada

nodes.excerpt: Refined Zapier is a free open source browser extension to improve the user experience of Zapier. We've enhanced styling, search, and navigation to help power users move faster and stay organized.
nodes.title: Refined Zapier - Open-source browser extension to improve Zapier's UX
nodes.author: Zach Waterfield

nodes.excerpt: Codemap is the world's first freelance marketplace for no-code/low-code and automation. Describe your project using our smart brief and we'll match you with top, pre-vetted no-code experts & teams. Launch your product, tool, or workflow in days or weeks!
nodes.title: Codemap 2.0 - World's first talent marketplace for no-code/automation
nodes.author: Nile

nodes.title: Vidiwise - 1-click video calls based on your visitor's journey, free

nodes.excerpt: HTTPDump gives you unique endpoints to dump data and inspect in real time. It also enables you to compare or mock response.
nodes.title: HTTPDump - Inspect HTTP requests, compare them or mock response

nodes.excerpt: There are too many no-code tools out there, and all of them have wonderful templates. But, if you want to find the right template to launch quickly, you have to scan the entire internet! - Beyta helps - and we'll be actively updating our template list. :)
nodes.title: Beyta - Search templates across no-code tools to launch quicker.

nodes.excerpt: NoCodeZ AI converts your business story into an app. You write a business story. You can detail what you see in the app and how the app should work. Our AI converts your story into web, IOS and Android apps with complete infrastructure. Itâ€™s quick and easy.
nodes.title: NoCodeZ - Build apps in no time
nodes.author: Sridhar Machiroutu

nodes.excerpt: BaseQL brings the power of GraphQL to Airtable, allowing you to query, filter and mutate records using a simple-yet-powerful Explorer. Integrate it easily with low-code and no-code applications! Join us on Slack: https://shorturl.at/nHR07
nodes.title: BaseQL - GraphQL for Airtable

nodes.title: Datature - No-code platform for building deep neural nets

nodes.excerpt: Lou makes it easy to proactively engage and retain users with interactive product announcements that take just minutes to launch & look built in-house. You can create beautiful no-code tooltips and announcements with Lou.

nodes.excerpt: Yuzu lets anyone build human-in-the-loop business processes without code. We combine powerful automations & integrations with the people-orchestration of a project management tool to keep your processes running to schedule.
nodes.title: Yuzu - Build complex, human-in-the-loop processes without code
nodes.author: Murat Mutlu

nodes.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
nodes.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain
nodes.author: Wilson Bright

nodes.excerpt: StackerX is our next-generation no-code platform for creating powerful business software. It's like superpowers for your business. We've been working behind the scenes on this for 6 months, and we're super excited to announce it here today.
nodes.title: StackerX - No-Code internal tools powered by Airtable, GSheets + more
